subfields.a: International Symposium on Olfaction and Taste

subfields.b: proceedings of the third international symposium /

subfields.a: Proceedings of the 1st conference, held in Stockholm in 1962, are entered under editor, Yngve Zotterman. Proceedings of the 2d conference held in Tokyo in 1965, are entered under its editor, Takashi Hayashi.

Comparative morphology of olfactory receptors / Rudolf Alexander Steinbrecht -- Notes on the fine structure of olfactory epithelium / Donald Frisch -- Electrical activity in olfactory receptor cells / Jürgen Boeckh -- Kinetics of olfactory receptor potentials / Karl Ernst Kaissling -- EOG problems / Sadayuki F. Takagi -- The electropositive potential in the normal and degenerating olfactory epithelium / Sadayuki F. Takagi, Kiyoshi Aoki, Masae Iino, and Toshi Yajima -- Activities of single olfactory receptor cells / Tatsuaki Shibuya -- The interaction of the peripheral olfactory system with nonodorous stimuli / Thomas V. Getchell -- Olfactory adaptation and the scaling of odor intensity / William S. Cain and Trygg Engen -- Intensity in mixtures of odorous substances / Egon P. Köster -- A linear relationship between olfactory effectiveness and identified molecular characteristics, extended to fifty pure substances / Paul Laffort -- A plan to identify most of the primary odors / John E. Amoore -- Correlations between electrophysiological activity from the human olfactory bulb and the subjective response to odoriferous stimuli / John R. Hughes, D. Eugene Hendrix, Nicholas Wetzel, and James W. Johnston Jr. -- Mechanism of olfactory discrimination in the olfactory bulb of the bullfrog / Shoji Higashino, Hideo Takeuchi, and John E. Amoore -- Reciprocal inhibition at glomerular level during bilateral olfactory stimulation / Jean Leveteau and Patrick MacLeod -- Effect of ethmoidal nerve stimulation on olfactory bulbar electrical activity / Herbert Stone -- Evidence for the differential migration of odorant molecules across the olfactory mucosa / Maxwell M. Mozell -- Summary of Olfaction Roundtable / Dietrich Schneider, chairman ; Carl Pfaffmann, reporter ; with John E. Amoore, Jürgen Boeckh, David G. Moulton, Maxwell M. Mozell, and Patrick MacLeod -- A new approach to insect pheromone specificity / Ernst Priesner -- Olfaction and behavioral sophistication in fish / Jelle Atema, J.H. Todd, and John E. Bardach -- Mammalian pheromones / W.K. Whitten -- Behavioral and electrophysiological responses of male rats to female rat urine odors / Donald Pfaff and Carl Pfaffmann -- Social communication by chemical signals in flying phalangers (Petaurus breviceps papuanus) / Thomas G. Schultze-Westrum -- Behavioral changes in pigeons after olfactory nerve section or bulb ablation / Bernice M. Wenzel, P.F. Albritton, A. Salzman, and T.E. Oberjat -- Olfactory mediation of immediate X-ray detection / James C. Smith and Don Tucker -- X-ray as an olfactory stimulus / John Garcia, Kenneth F. Green, and Brenda K. McGowan -- The ultrastructure of vertebrate taste buds / P.P.C. Graziadei -- Cell types in rabbit taste buds / Raymond G. Murray -- Local potential changes at sensory nerve fiber terminals of the frog tongue / Hiromichi Nomura and Sanya Sakada -- Innervation of rat fungiform papilla / Lloyd M. Beidler -- Electrical signs of taste receptor activity / Hiromichi Morita -- The mechanism of insect sugar reception, a biochemical investigation / Kai Hansen -- Relations between ATP and chemical transmitters in the frog's receptors / Giovanni Rapuzzi, Anna Violante, and Cesare Casella -- Glucose dehydrogenase activity of a "sweet-sensitive protein" from bovine tongues / Steven Price and Richard M. Hogan -- Effects of adaptation on human taste function / Donald H. McBurney -- Basis for taste quality in man / Ernest Dzendolet -- A comparative study on the neural and psychophysical response to taste stimuli / Herman Diamant and Yngve Zotterman -- Effects of Gymnema sylvestre and Synsepalum dulcificum on taste in man / Linda M. Bartoshuk, G.P. Dateo, D.J. Vandenbelt, R.L. Buttrick, and L. Long Jr. -- Miraculin, the sweetness-inducing principle from miracle fruit / G.J. Henning, J.N. Brouwer, H. van der Wel, and A. Francke -- Isolation and mechanism of taste modifiers; taste-modifying protein and gymnemic acids / Kenzo Kurihara, Yoshie Kurihara, and Lloyd M. Beidler -- Afferent specificity in taste / Masayasu Sato, Satoru Yamashita, and Hisashi Ogawa -- The distribution of taste sensitivities among single taste fibers / Marion Frank and Carl Pfaffmann -- Information processing in the taste system of the rat / Gernot S. Doetsch, Judith Jay Ganchrow, Linda M. Nelson, and Robert P. Erickson -- Taste psychophysics in animals / Gordon Rolfe Morrison -- Modality coding of lingual afferents in the cat thalamus / Raimond Emmers -- Summary of Taste Roundtable / Carl Pfaffmann, chairman and reporter ; with Ernest Dzendolet, Robert P. Erickson, Marion Frank, Gordon Rolfe Morrison, Masayasu Sato -- The role of adrenocortical hormone secretion in salt appetite / Derek A. Denton, J.F. Nelson, Elspeth Orchard, and Sigrid Weller -- Innate mechanisms for regulation of sodium intake / George Wolf -- Preference threshold and appetite for NaCl solution as affected by propylthiouracil and desoxycorticosterone acetate in rats / Melvin J. Fregly -- Spontaneous sodium appetite and red-cell type in sheep / A. Robert Michell and F.R. Bell -- Discriminatory responses or hypothalamic osmosensitive units to gustatory stimulation in cats / Stelios Nicolaïdis -- The metabolic regulation of taste acuity / Robert I. Henkin -- Digestive functions of taste stimuli / Morley R. Kare -- Antidiuresis associated with the ingestion of food substances / Jan W. Kakolewski and Elliot S. Valenstein -- Depression of intake by saccharin adulteration : the role of taste quality on the control of food intake / Robert L. Gentile -- Abstracts submitted for discussion / Akira Adachi [and others].
International Symposium on Olfaction and Taste (3rd : 1968 : Rockefeller University, N.Y.).
